top_procedures.description: Physician supervision of a patient receiving medicare-covered services provided by a participating home health agency (patient not present) requiring complex and multidisciplinary care modalities involving regular physician development and/or revision of c

Subsequent hospital inpatient care, typically 25 minutes per day
Initial hospital inpatient care, typically 50 minutes per day
